Screaming Sand Strike.name: Screaming Sand Strike
Screaming Sand Strike.flavor: The wind howls when your weapon connects, as the desert spirits clamor for blood to quench their bitter thirst.
Screaming Sand Strike.onHit: 1[W] + ability modifier thunder damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Screaming Sand Strike.effect: You gain concealment until the end of your next turn.

Bane of the Crimson Sun.name: Bane of the Crimson Sun
Bane of the Crimson Sun.flavor: The accursed sun lends strength to your attack, leaving your enemy gasping beneath its punishing heat.
Bane of the Crimson Sun.onHit: 2[W] + ability modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends). Each time the target fails this saving throw, it takes 10 fire damage and is knocked prone.
Bane of the Crimson Sun.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Dust Storm Dance.name: Dust Storm Dance
Dust Storm Dance.flavor: You become a raging dust storm, sending your enemies stumbling as you sweep across the battlefield.
Dust Storm Dance.effect: You swap places with a creature of your size or smaller within 3 squares of you. Then you can swap places with a different creature of your size or smaller within 3 squares of you. Each creature you swap places with grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
